contextId.information: This is background information to remind the reader that this is Daniel's second vision. AT: "had a second vision appear to me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: had a vision appear to me (after the one ... first)

contextId.information: This phrase is inserted as background information to explain where the ram was located. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: I had seen the ram standing on the bank of the canal

contextId.information: This is background information about who Ahasuerus was. The UDB places this in parentheses to make that clear. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: It was Ahasuerus who had been made king over the realm of the Babylonians
